description:
This course is designed for beginners to not only Construct 2, but also to game development.  My goal is to reach those that have never created a video game, and walk them through the process of creating their first game using Construct 2 Free Edition.

All assets and source code is provided.

This course is roughly 1.25 hours in length.

Download the free version of Construct 2 from www.scirra.com
title: Beginner Game Development with Construct 2
